name: basher
content:
basher noun
(hit)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who hits something or someone hard: She’s a talented basher on the tennis court. They were art students and bongo bashers.
More examplesFewer examplesHe thrives on an opponent's power but will never be anything more than a back-court basher.She believes the police force protects brutal bashers and outright liars.

basher noun
(criticize)
a person who criticizes someone or something severely: He’s a contributing editor, rock critic, and snarky celeb basher for a music magazine. See
bash
